extends AbstractService<User>

      • getUserSecure

        public User getUserSecure(java.lang.String email,
                          java.lang.String password)
                   throws java.io.IOException,
                          InvalidAccessAttemptException
        Upon first log in by a user this method is used to set the user to return data for, the "currentUser"
        Parameters:
        email - The login attempts email
        password - The login attempts password
        Returns:
        the user object who just made the attempt to login
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        InvalidAccessAttemptException - If password is invalid

      • get

        public User get(java.lang.String email)
        The get method in the AbstractService class is not secure so @Override has been implemented so when it is called an exception will be thrown.
        Overrides:
        get in class AbstractService<User>

      • addTransaction

        public void addTransaction(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode holdingNode)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Appends Transaction to old holdings/adds new holding with a new Transaction. Handles both adding an removing holdings and updates any necessary values in said holding such as acquisitionCost.
        Parameters:
        holdingNode - The node sent from the JS front-end containing an "acronym", "holdingType","quantity","name" (optional) and "dateBought"
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • removeValueFromOtherHolding

        private void removeValueFromOtherHolding(int holdingIndexToReduce,
                                         double valueToReduce,
                                         java.util.Date date)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        If the User chooses to bought a holding at the expense of another this method is used Not stable enough for 1.3, will be used in future.
        Parameters:
        holdingIndexToReduce - The index of the UserHolding List found in User
        valueToReduce - how much to reduce the old value by
        date - the date in which the Transaction takes place
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • indexOfHolding

        private int indexOfHolding(java.lang.String acronym,
                           HoldingType holdingType)
        If a UserHolding is included in the User's list will return its index
        Parameters:
        acronym - The acronym of the UserHolding to find
        holdingType - The holdingType of the UserHolding to find
        Returns:
        the index of the UserHolding or -1 if not found

      • getGraphHoldingData

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<GraphHoldingData>> getGraphHoldingData()
                                                                                     throws com.mashape.unirest.http.exceptions.UnirestException,
                                                                                            java.io.IOException,
                                                                                            java.text.ParseException,
                                                                                            InvalidHoldingException
        Fetches GraphHoldingData for each holding in the UserHolding List in User
        Returns:
        A map containing "total","stock","crypto" and "fiat". Each of these keys contains a value of a List of GraphHoldingData
        Throws:
        com.mashape.unirest.http.exceptions.UnirestException

        java.text.ParseException

      • reduceHoldingQuantity

        public void reduceHoldingQuantity(java.lang.String acronym,
                                  HoldingType holdingType,
                                  double amountToRemove)
                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                  com.mashape.unirest.http.exceptions.UnirestException,
                                  java.text.ParseException,
                                  InvalidHoldingException
        Reduces the UserHolding quantity, if quantity to remove is greater than total quantity, method removes UserHolding entirely
        Parameters:
        acronym - The acronym of the UserHolding to remove
        holdingType - the holdingType of the UserHolding to remove
        amountToRemove - the amount to remove from the UserHolding
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        com.mashape.unirest.http.exceptions.UnirestException
        java.text.ParseException
        InvalidHoldingException

                                                                       java.util.Map<java.util.Date,java.lang.Double> map2)
        Merges two maps into one, used to merge UserHolding histories
        Parameters:
        map1 - the larger map
        map2 - the smaller map
        Returns:
        An amalgam Map of map1 and map2 with a key of Date and a value of Double
